sentences.en: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
An intelligent computer will be an indispensable diagnostic tool for doctors.
sentences.cn: 智能计算机将成为医生不可或缺的诊断工具。

sentences.en: Attlee was extremely intelligent and his grasp of the situation was masterly.
sentences.cn: 阿特利聪明过人，对局势的把握颇为高明。

sentences.en: Gradually, with an intelligent use of flashbacks, Yves' story unravels.
sentences.cn: 通过巧妙运用倒叙手法，伊夫的故事慢慢呈现出来。

sentences.en: He comes across as an intelligent, sophisticated, charmer.
sentences.cn: 他给人的印象是有头脑、老练，很会讨人喜欢。

sentences.en: He surrounds himself with attractive, intelligent, or well-known people.
sentences.cn: 他混迹于有魅力、有学问或有名气的人当中。

sentences.en: He ventured the opinion that "whales are as intelligent as human beings".
sentences.cn: 他大胆提出了“鲸与人类一样聪明”的观点。

sentences.en: He's an intelligent man and a nice fella.
sentences.cn: 他是个聪明人，是个好小伙。

sentences.en: I don't class myself as being very intelligent or brainy.
sentences.cn: 我并不认为自己是那种非常聪明、脑子好使的人。

sentences.en: I thought he was very attractive and obviously very intelligent.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他魅力非凡，才智过人。

sentences.en: She was thin and spare, with a sharply intelligent face.
sentences.cn: 她又高又瘦，一副精明过人的模样。

sentences.en: Sofia was attractive and formidably intelligent.
sentences.cn: 索菲娅很有魅力，而且才智过人。

sentences.en: Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.cn: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

sentences.en: Susan'sa very bright and intelligent woman who knows her own mind.
sentences.cn: 苏珊是个非常聪明、有主见的女子。

sentences.en: They are bright, intelligent, able and confident.
sentences.cn: 他们聪明又智慧，能干又自信。

sentences.en: Why do intelligent people find quack remedies so appealing?
sentences.cn: 为什么聪明人会被江湖医术所吸引？

sentences.en: You're too intelligent to fall for his flattery.
sentences.cn: 你很聪明，不会受他的阿谀奉承所惑。

words.tran_cn: 可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的
智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人
知识分子；凭理智做事者
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力

phrases.tran_cn: 智能代理；职能代理软件；智能主体
智能汽车；无人驾驶汽车
智能机器人；智慧型机器人
智能终端；智能型终端设备

trans.tran_cn: 聪慧的，有才智的，智能的
trans.tran_en: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly
